title: Vktech AT&T Novatel MiFi 2372 Wireless Mobile Hotspot USB 3G Network WiFi Router
features: Transform 3G network into WiFi, and offers a Wifi hotspot gateway to your device
Connects up to any 5 Wi-Fi enabled devices simultaneously
Come with micro SD card slot, it supports micro SD up to 32G
Rechargeable li-ion battery enables about 4 hours connectivity
description: Quick View: The ultimate AT&T Novatel Wireless MiFi 2372 Mobile Hotspot Router is used to transform 3G network into WiFi hotspot and offers a hotspot gateway to the internet and lets you connect up to 5 Wi-Fi enabled devices simultaneously.  Features: Transform 3G network into WiFi, and offers a Wifi hotspot gateway to your device. Connects up to any 5 Wi-Fi enabled devices simultaneously. High-speed, easy-install and perfect connectivity. Come with micro SD card slot, it supports micro SD up to 32G. Enhanced performance and exquisite appearance. Rechargeable li-ion battery enables about 4 hours connectivity. Perfect for PC, tablet PC, iPad, Smart Phone, and game console to surf the Internet by WiFi.  Specification: Color: Black Model: MiFi2372 Frequency: Tri-Band WCDMA: HSUPA/HSDPA (850/1900/2100 MHz) Quad-Band GPRS/EDGE (850/900/1800/1900 MHz) Compatibility: Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7; Mac OS X, 10.4, and later; and Linux Use time: up to 4 hours Item size: 10 * 6.3 * 1.5cm Item weight: 54g  Includes: 1 x MiFi2372 Mobile Hotspot 1 x USB Cable 1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 1 x User Manual
